column6: It's time to Ragnarok and roll in Las Vegas, as X-Factor--teamed with everyone's favorite Thunder God--squares off in a high-stakes, winner-take-all throw down with Hela to determine the fate of Pip the Troll. And for one member of the team, it will be the beginning of the end... 32 PGS./Rated T ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | penciller:EMANUELA LUPACCHINO | penciller:David Yardin
